==================
Single Photons TDC
==================

This project consists of the Python wrapper running on the Xilinx Pynq controlling the hardware design for pulse counting,time to digital converters and signal generators on the programmable logic.


.. toctree::
   Top Level Python application <_autosummary/Single_Photons.sp_MAIN>
   Single Photons Hardware wrapper  <_autosummary/Single_Photons.SP>


   Authors <authors>

   License <license>
